caseName: State v. Savath, 447 P.3d 1, 298 Or. App. 495 (2019)

detailed: Savath was arrested after a traffic stop.
Search revealed drugs, cash, and drug-related items.

evidence.detailed: Drugs, cash, packaging materials, payment records.
Incriminating text messages on Savath's phone.

legalArgument.detailed: Savath challenged the validity of the search warrant.
Argued against the particularity of the warrant.

initialJudgment.detailed: Motion to suppress text messages denied.
Savath was convicted after a jury trial.

detailed: Savath appealed against the warrant's validity.
Argued the warrant was insufficiently particular.
Court of Appeals agreed with Savath.
